entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
